item.description:
Open to 4s and anyone in relationship to 4s also
For Type 4s who are looking for practical ways to be centered, creative, balanced and able to enjoy life more with yourself and in relationship to others. We'll focus on understanding Type 4s in depth and subtypes of 4. We'll focus on practical ways to balance and interact and relate well to each type. If anyone needs to leave early at 9:30 we'll pause for that transition. Option to end between 9:30/10pm. Refreshments served

 

Herb Pearce is an Enneagram teacher, therapist and trainer in organizations. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living.

www.herbpearce.com

herb@herbpearce.com

781 648 3737
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Type 4 Workshop - For 4s and anyone in relationship to a 4
